mapper.update: update TESPProcession set ProcessionName = #{processionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ProcessionContact = #{processionContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ProcessionDuty = #{processionDuty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ProcessionLeaderName = #{processionLeaderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ProcessionLeaderContact = #{processionLeaderContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ProcessionNumbers = #{processionNumbers,jdbcType=INTEGER}, InspectionArea = #{inspectionArea,jdbcType=BIGINT}, Remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, ProcessionName, ProcessionContact, ProcessionDuty, ProcessionLeaderName, ProcessionLeaderContact, ProcessionNumbers, InspectionArea, Remark from TESPProcession where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select t1.id, ProcessionName, ProcessionContact, ProcessionDuty, ProcessionLeaderName, ProcessionLeaderContact, ProcessionNumbers, RegionName, Remark from TESPProcession t1 left join TESPRegion t2 on InspectionArea=t2.id where t1.id=#{id}

select t1.id, ProcessionName, ProcessionContact, ProcessionDuty, ProcessionLeaderName, ProcessionLeaderContact, ProcessionNumbers, RegionName, Remark from TESPProcession t1 left join TESPRegion t2 on InspectionArea=t2.id where t1.InspectionArea=#{id}
select id, ProcessionName, ProcessionContact, ProcessionDuty, ProcessionLeaderName, ProcessionLeaderContact, ProcessionNumbers, InspectionArea, Remark from TESPProcession

select count(*) from TESPProcession t1 left join TESPRegion t2 on InspectionArea=t2.id where 1=1
and ProcessionName like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{processionName}), '%')
and ProcessionLeaderName like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{processionLeaderName}), '%')
and InspectionArea =#{area}
